story.subtitle: Authenticity & Passion
story.title: Our Story
story.description: Located in the heart of Concarneau, the Restaurant La Coquille embodies the elegance and passion of Breton cuisine. Since its inception, the restaurant has been dedicated to showcasing the best of local products, enhanced by a modern and creative approach.

ingredients.subtitle: Excellence & Freshness
ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.description: At La Coquille, we believe in the excellence and freshness of every ingredient. Each dish we prepare is a celebration of local and seasonal products, carefully selected to offer authentic and unforgettable flavors.

chief.subtitle: Expertise & Creativity
chief.title: Our Chef
chief.description: Chef of La Coquille, Jean-Fran√ßois Sicallac combines expertise and creativity to offer an authentic and refined cuisine. Each dish is crafted as a unique experience, highlighting local ingredients and honoring the culinary traditions of Brittany.
